ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] beastlord
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as I know no matter what class you play that has allows a pet whether you be a BST Sk Necro Shaman Chanter Wiz(?) Mage(?) whatever you are only allowed
ygData.messageBody:
As far as I know no matter what class you play that has allows a pet whether
you be a BST Sk Necro Shaman Chanter Wiz(?) Mage(?) whatever you are only
allowed one pet at a time. From what I have seen the higher level spell
you cast that is a pet summoning spell that pet is supposed to be better
than its lower level equivalent.

Halyburton 53Barb Shaman (Saryrn)
----- Original Message -----
From: "Justin" <pavisoj@...>



I have a question I know that a beastlord gets a pet at level 9. What
happens when he gets the new pet at higher levels does the old one go away
for the new one or can he have more than one pet. I mean if you get a new
pet spell and the old warder is powerful why would you take a new one if
the old one is powerful or is the new one even more powerful? I am starting
a beastlord on the Drinal server by the name of Jubar and Vah Shir. any
help would be appreciative. Thank you for your

Carrin 3rd level Halfling warrior
Jubar 1st level Vah Shir Beastlord
